messages.title: OUR CHALLENGES IN 2015: CHANGE BRITISH POLITICS FOR GOOD.
messages.content: With the astounding result UKIP achieved in the European and Council elections on May 22, it is clear that the British voters can see past the smears and distractions of the tried, old, legacy parties and want a real voice in politics – and that voice is UKIP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP aims to keep the political earthquake rumbling into Westminster next year by capitalising on the growth of the People’s Army and securing their first MPs.

issues.brexitEurope: With more representation in Brussels, we're not going to stop there. UKIP wants to keep the political earthquake rumbling into Westminster next year by capitalising on the growth of the People’s Army and securing our first MPs.

images.caption: THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT, FROM UKIP AND NIGEL FARAGE
